Superhero Training Academy: Create an immersive experience where kids can become their favorite superheroes. Set up an obstacle course with challenges such as jumping over obstacles, climbing walls, and crawling through tunnels. Provide superhero costumes and masks for each child to enhance the experience. Confidence Score: 0.8

Space Adventure: Transform the party space into a galaxy with planets, stars, and spaceships. Create a scavenger hunt where kids have to find hidden planets and alien artifacts. You can also have a "space station" where kids can make their own alien crafts. Confidence Score: 0.9

Pirate's Treasure Hunt: Set up a pirate-themed party with a treasure hunt. Hide clues and treasure around the party area, and have kids work together to solve riddles and puzzles to find the loot. You can also have a "walk the plank" activity and a "treasure chest" filled with gold coins and other treats. Confidence Score: 0.9

Outer Space Camping: Take the party outdoors and set up a camping adventure in a nearby park or backyard. Create a "space station" with tents and glow-in-the-dark decorations. Have kids make their own space-themed crafts and enjoy a campfire with s'mores and other treats. Confidence Score: 0.8

Dinosaur Discovery: Transform the party space into a prehistoric jungle with dinosaur decorations and fossil-themed games. Set up a "dino dig" where kids can excavate plastic dinosaurs from a sandbox, and have a "dino petting zoo" where kids can hold and pet stuffed dinosaurs. Confidence Score: 0.9
